snippet.title: Rail Route: a train dispatcher simulator for PC. Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1124180/Rail_Route/
▶️ Follow development: https://discord.gg/avBjPqT 
🐦Twitter: https://twitter.com/RailRouteGame

Rail Route is a train dispatcher simulator. Control the traffic, build railroads and set up the routes for trains. Unlock features to your dispatcher interface, upgrade rail network elements and unlock new technologies that allow you to automate the operations!
